Type.Name: PositionType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PositionType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Indicates a position for placement or layout.

remarks.para: A PositionType is used to place widgets, usually relative to other widgets or other parts of the same widget. For example, the position of a handle in a , or the position of tabs in a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.PositionType Bottom = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The relevant item should be placed at the bottom.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.PositionType Left = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The relevant item should be placed on the left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.PositionType Right = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The relevant item should be placed on the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.PositionType Top = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The relevant item should be placed at the top.
